## Data Source Information

### Name
Name of the data source

### Provider/Organization
Who publishes this data?

### URL
Link to the data source or documentation

### License
What license is the data released under?
- [ ] Public Domain
- [ ] Creative Commons (specify: CC0, CC-BY, etc.)
- [ ] Government Open Data
- [ ] Other (specify)

## Data Description

### Content Type
What type of mineral/materials data does this contain?
- [ ] Production statistics
- [ ] Trade/import/export data
- [ ] Geological/deposit data
- [ ] Price data
- [ ] Reserve estimates
- [ ] Environmental/sustainability data
- [ ] Other (specify)

### Format
What format is the data in?
- [ ] CSV
- [ ] JSON
- [ ] XML
- [ ] PDF (requires OCR)
- [ ] API
- [ ] Other (specify)

### Coverage
- Temporal: [e.g., 2020-2024, historical]
- Geographic: [e.g., Global, US only, specific regions]
- Commodities: [e.g., All minerals, REE only, specific list]

## Value Proposition
Why would this data source be valuable for CMM LLM fine-tuning?

## Special Considerations
Any special handling, parsing challenges, or notes about the data?

If possible, provide a small sample of the data format:
